resources.string: Your blood alcohol content is now above 5
Your blood alcohol content is now above 3
Your blood alcohol content is now above 2
Your blood alcohol content is now above 1
Your blood alcohol content is now above 0.5
Your blood alcohol content is still below 0.5
"Velkommen til Alculator\n\Når du åbner denne applikation vil du bliver introduceret til denne skærm.\n\Denne vejledning vil lede dig gennem hvor nemt det er at bruge den egen personlige Alculator."

"First thing you need to know is how to add drinks to your alculator. To do this click this button.\n\When you have added a drink they will also show up in this window along with this button, you may click you drink to select it or you can hold your finger on them to see info on your drink."
"When you have a drink selected, click these buttons to add or subtract one of your selected drink to your alculators per mille calculation."
"Use these tabs on the top of the screen to jump between menus that will tell you more about your personal per mille calculation or change you settings."
"When adding a drink you will encounter this screen for filling out information on your drink."
"You may click this empty frame to add a personal picture from your gallery to your drink.\n\There is nothing more to it, your alculator is ready for use."
